description: Try our easy to follow Cook Ahead Casserole recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Stew & casserole,High protein,One-pot,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Beef,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Cook Ahead Casserole Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half the oil in a large heatproof casserole pan. Add the meat in batches and brown all over. Remove to a bowl. Add the rest of the oil and cook the onion, carrot, celery and garlic for 5 minutes. Sprinkle over the flour and mix in well.
Return the meat to the pan with thyme, stock, purée and Worcestershire sauce. Season with salt and pepper and mix well.
Cover, place in oven and cook for 1 hour and 30 minutes until tender, stirring occasionally.
